ComicInfo.Summary:
The SPECTRE Civil War reaches its explosive conclusion! Who will come out on top, the established Ernst Stavro Blofeld or the upstart Titania Jones? Either way, will James Bond -- and the world -- survive? Can 007 use this war to bring SPECTRE down from within...or will he end up just one more casualty?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 3 | D/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 4 | E/RE | Premium Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 5 | F/FOC | 1:11 FOC "Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 6 | G/FOC | 1:15 FOC "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 7 |
